response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been highly valued by our previous customers. Given its quality and features, we believe it's worth more than what you're expecting. Considering its actual value, I propose to sell it to you for $110. This price reflects a fair compromise between its true worth and your perceived value. I'm confident you'll find it to be a great investment. Please let me know if this offer suits your budget.", "product_price": 110}
